mapper.insert: insert into tb_brand(brand_name, company_name, ordered, description, status, type_id) values (#{brandName}, #{companyName}, #{ordered}, #{description}, #{status}, #{typeId});
mapper.update: update tb_brand set brand_name = #{brandName}, company_name = #{companyName}, ordered = #{ordered}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, type_id = #{typeId} where id = #{id};
mapper.delete: delete from tb_brand where id in (${brandIds})
